content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":164081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔女リクチェルにかけられた呪いが原因」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's caused by a curse placed by the witch Rikucheru."},{"lineNumber":164082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リクチェル？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rikucheru?"},{"lineNumber":164083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　って、確か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If I remember correctly..."},{"lineNumber":164084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、偶然にも儂をこのような姿にした","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, by chance, she is the witch who transformed me into this form."},{"lineNumber":164085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔女リクチェルですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"She is the witch Rikucheru."},{"lineNumber":164086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「村が危機に陥ったとき、魔女リクチェルが","translatedEnglishLine":"When the village was in danger, the witch Rikucheru appeared before Merufeisu and said,"},{"lineNumber":164087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メルフェイスの前に現れ言ったそうですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"that is what happened."},{"lineNumber":164088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「苦しみを受け入れてでも力が欲しいか？　と」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Do you want power even if it means accepting suffering?'"},{"lineNumber":164089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに頷くとメルフェイスには","translatedEnglishLine":"When Merufeisu nodded to that,"},{"lineNumber":164090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一つの呪いがかけられもうした」","translatedEnglishLine":"a curse was placed upon her."},{"lineNumber":164091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、焦らすな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, don't keep me waiting."},{"lineNumber":164092,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その呪いとはなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of curse is it?"},{"lineNumber":164093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔法力を飛躍的に上げる代わりに、","translatedEnglishLine":"In exchange for a dramatic increase in magical power,"},{"lineNumber":164094,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二ヶ月に一度、男性と","translatedEnglishLine":"she must have sex with a man once every two months,"},{"lineNumber":164095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　セックスしなければ死ぬ呪いですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"or she will die — that's the curse."},{"lineNumber":164096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What?"},{"lineNumber":164097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それもただの男ではいけません。","translatedEnglishLine":"And it can't be just any man."},{"lineNumber":164098,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分よりもレベルの高い男性ですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It must be a man with a higher level than herself."},{"lineNumber":164099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの子本人のレベルの高さにより、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of her own high level,"},{"lineNumber":164100,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相手を探すことにすら難儀しておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"she has had trouble even finding a suitable partner."},{"lineNumber":164101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「軍に入ってからは何人か世話役がいたのですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"After joining the military, there were a few caretakers for her,"},{"lineNumber":164102,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メルフェイスのレベルが上がるにつれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"but as Merufeisu's level rose,"},{"lineNumber":164103,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みるみる軍内でも世話できる者は減り……","translatedEnglishLine":"those who could care for her within the army rapidly decreased..."},{"lineNumber":164104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「現在は素行こそ問題はあるものの、","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently, although his behavior is problematic,"},{"lineNumber":164105,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レベルだけは高いジャロが担当しておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Jaro, who has a high level, is her caretaker."},{"lineNumber":164106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see."},{"lineNumber":164107,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言われてみりゃジャロが何度か","translatedEnglishLine":"Now that you mention it, Jaro has said similar things a few times."},{"lineNumber":164108,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな感じのことを言ってたな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, something along those lines."},{"lineNumber":164109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってことはメルフェイスちゃんは","translatedEnglishLine":"So that means Merufeisu-chan"},{"lineNumber":164110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ジャロを愛していたわけじゃなく……","translatedEnglishLine":"wasn't actually in love with Jaro..."},{"lineNumber":164111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一定期間内に抱かれる為の男ですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's just the man she must be with within a certain period."},{"lineNumber":164112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれは儂がチャカに頼まれて、","translatedEnglishLine":"That one was sent by me at Chaka's request,"},{"lineNumber":164113,"originalJapaneseLine":"　紫の軍に派遣したもの……","translatedEnglishLine":"dispatched to the purple army..."},{"lineNumber":164114,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさかあんなに増長しとるとは思わなんだが……","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought he would get so arrogant..."},{"lineNumber":164115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな話……初めて聞きました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've never heard a story like that before..."},{"lineNumber":164116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、他言無用の話じゃ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, it is a tale not to be told to others."},{"lineNumber":164117,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア様とマリス様、それと今までの世話役、","translatedEnglishLine":"Only Lady Ria, Lady Maris, previous caretakers,"},{"lineNumber":164118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　将軍でも儂とチャカしか知らぬことよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"the general, myself, and Chaka know about this."},{"lineNumber":164119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レベルは下がらんのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Does her level not go down?"},{"lineNumber":164120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サボってればいいだろ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can't she just slack off?"},{"lineNumber":164121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本人の資質によるものか、呪いの力か、","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether due to her own talent or the curse's power,"},{"lineNumber":164122,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不思議なことにどれだけサボっても","translatedEnglishLine":"strangely, no matter how much she slacks off,"},{"lineNumber":164123,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レベルは下がらんのですじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"her level does not decrease..."},{"lineNumber":164124,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本人もレベルが上がらぬように気をつけておるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"She tries to be careful not to increase her level,"},{"lineNumber":164125,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みるみると高レベルになり……","translatedEnglishLine":"but her level rises rapidly..."},{"lineNumber":164126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、リーザス軍で相手が出来る男性と言えば……","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, as for men in the Leazas army who can be with her..."},{"lineNumber":164127,"originalJapaneseLine":"チャカの目がリックに向けられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaka's eyes turned toward Rick."},{"lineNumber":164128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リック殿！　どうか頼まれてはもらえぬか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rick! Could you please help?"},{"lineNumber":164129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じ、自分ですか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"M-me?"},{"lineNumber":164130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの子のレベルは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Her level is,"},{"lineNumber":164131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう相手が軍内でも","translatedEnglishLine":"even within the army,"},{"lineNumber":164132,"originalJapaneseLine":"　簡単には見つからぬほど高すぎる」","translatedEnglishLine":"so high that it's not easy to find a partner."},{"lineNumber":164133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「相手が出来るのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"As for who can be with her,"},{"lineNumber":164134,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう今この場ではリック殿くらいしか……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"right now, Lord Rick is about the only one here who can!"},{"lineNumber":164135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「し、しかし……自分は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"B-but... I am..."},{"lineNumber":164136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなこと頼むのはぶしつけと知っておる！","translatedEnglishLine":"I know it's rude to ask for something like this!"},{"lineNumber":164137,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかし、今は……","translatedEnglishLine":"However, at this moment..."},{"lineNumber":164138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こらこらこらー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey hey hey!"},{"lineNumber":164139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス殿……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"L-Lord Rance...?"},{"lineNumber":164140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故俺様に頼まない！","translatedEnglishLine":"Why wouldn't you ask me!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女リクチェルにかけられた呪いが原因」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's caused by a curse placed by the witch Rikucheru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リクチェル？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rikucheru?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、確か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I remember correctly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、偶然にも儂をこのような姿にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, by chance, she is the witch who transformed me into this form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女リクチェルですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is the witch Rikucheru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「村が危機に陥ったとき、魔女リクチェルが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the village was in danger, the witch Rikucheru appeared before Merufeisu and said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスの前に現れ言ったそうですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that is what happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「苦しみを受け入れてでも力が欲しいか？　と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Do you want power even if it means accepting suffering?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに頷くとメルフェイスには
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Merufeisu nodded to that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つの呪いがかけられもうした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a curse was placed upon her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、焦らすな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don't keep me waiting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その呪いとはなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of curse is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法力を飛躍的に上げる代わりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In exchange for a dramatic increase in magical power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二ヶ月に一度、男性と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she must have sex with a man once every two months,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスしなければ死ぬ呪いですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or she will die — that's the curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それもただの男ではいけません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it can't be just any man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分よりもレベルの高い男性ですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It must be a man with a higher level than herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの子本人のレベルの高さにより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of her own high level,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手を探すことにすら難儀しておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she has had trouble even finding a suitable partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「軍に入ってからは何人か世話役がいたのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After joining the military, there were a few caretakers for her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスのレベルが上がるにつれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as Merufeisu's level rose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みるみる軍内でも世話できる者は減り……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those who could care for her within the army rapidly decreased...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現在は素行こそ問題はあるものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, although his behavior is problematic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルだけは高いジャロが担当しておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro, who has a high level, is her caretaker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言われてみりゃジャロが何度か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that you mention it, Jaro has said similar things a few times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな感じのことを言ってたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, something along those lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってことはメルフェイスちゃんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that means Merufeisu-chan

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロを愛していたわけじゃなく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wasn't actually in love with Jaro...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一定期間内に抱かれる為の男ですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's just the man she must be with within a certain period.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれは儂がチャカに頼まれて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That one was sent by me at Chaka's request,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 紫の軍に派遣したもの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dispatched to the purple army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさかあんなに増長しとるとは思わなんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought he would get so arrogant...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな話……初めて聞きました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never heard a story like that before...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、他言無用の話じゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, it is a tale not to be told to others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様とマリス様、それと今までの世話役、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Lady Ria, Lady Maris, previous caretakers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍でも儂とチャカしか知らぬことよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the general, myself, and Chaka know about this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レベルは下がらんのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does her level not go down?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サボってればいいだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't she just slack off?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人の資質によるものか、呪いの力か、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether due to her own talent or the curse's power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議なことにどれだけサボっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: strangely, no matter how much she slacks off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルは下がらんのですじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her level does not decrease...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人もレベルが上がらぬように気をつけておるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tries to be careful not to increase her level,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みるみると高レベルになり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but her level rises rapidly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、リーザス軍で相手が出来る男性と言えば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, as for men in the Leazas army who can be with her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカの目がリックに向けられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka's eyes turned toward Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リック殿！　どうか頼まれてはもらえぬか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rick! Could you please help?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じ、自分ですか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの子のレベルは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her level is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう相手が軍内でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even within the army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単には見つからぬほど高すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so high that it's not easy to find a partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相手が出来るのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for who can be with her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう今この場ではリック殿くらいしか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right now, Lord Rick is about the only one here who can!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、しかし……自分は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-but... I am...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなこと頼むのはぶしつけと知っておる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know it's rude to ask for something like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, at this moment...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こらこらこらー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey hey hey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス殿……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L-Lord Rance...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故俺様に頼まない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why wouldn't you ask me!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女リクチェルにかけられた呪いが原因」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's caused by a curse placed by the witch Rikucheru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リクチェル？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rikucheru?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、確か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I remember correctly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、偶然にも儂をこのような姿にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, by chance, she is the witch who transformed me into this form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女リクチェルですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is the witch Rikucheru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「村が危機に陥ったとき、魔女リクチェルが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the village was in danger, the witch Rikucheru appeared before Merufeisu and said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスの前に現れ言ったそうですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that is what happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「苦しみを受け入れてでも力が欲しいか？　と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Do you want power even if it means accepting suffering?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに頷くとメルフェイスには
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Merufeisu nodded to that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つの呪いがかけられもうした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a curse was placed upon her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、焦らすな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don't keep me waiting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その呪いとはなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of curse is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法力を飛躍的に上げる代わりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In exchange for a dramatic increase in magical power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二ヶ月に一度、男性と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she must have sex with a man once every two months,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスしなければ死ぬ呪いですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or she will die — that's the curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それもただの男ではいけません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it can't be just any man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分よりもレベルの高い男性ですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It must be a man with a higher level than herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの子本人のレベルの高さにより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of her own high level,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手を探すことにすら難儀しておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she has had trouble even finding a suitable partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「軍に入ってからは何人か世話役がいたのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After joining the military, there were a few caretakers for her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスのレベルが上がるにつれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as Merufeisu's level rose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みるみる軍内でも世話できる者は減り……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those who could care for her within the army rapidly decreased...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現在は素行こそ問題はあるものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, although his behavior is problematic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルだけは高いジャロが担当しておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jaro, who has a high level, is her caretaker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なるほど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言われてみりゃジャロが何度か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that you mention it, Jaro has said similar things a few times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな感じのことを言ってたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, something along those lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってことはメルフェイスちゃんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that means Merufeisu-chan

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャロを愛していたわけじゃなく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wasn't actually in love with Jaro...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一定期間内に抱かれる為の男ですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's just the man she must be with within a certain period.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれは儂がチャカに頼まれて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That one was sent by me at Chaka's request,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 紫の軍に派遣したもの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dispatched to the purple army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさかあんなに増長しとるとは思わなんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought he would get so arrogant...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな話……初めて聞きました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never heard a story like that before...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、他言無用の話じゃ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, it is a tale not to be told to others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様とマリス様、それと今までの世話役、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Lady Ria, Lady Maris, previous caretakers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍でも儂とチャカしか知らぬことよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the general, myself, and Chaka know about this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レベルは下がらんのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does her level not go down?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サボってればいいだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't she just slack off?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人の資質によるものか、呪いの力か、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether due to her own talent or the curse's power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議なことにどれだけサボっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: strangely, no matter how much she slacks off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レベルは下がらんのですじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her level does not decrease...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人もレベルが上がらぬように気をつけておるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tries to be careful not to increase her level,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みるみると高レベルになり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but her level rises rapidly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、リーザス軍で相手が出来る男性と言えば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, as for men in the Leazas army who can be with her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チャカの目がリックに向けられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaka's eyes turned toward Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リック殿！　どうか頼まれてはもらえぬか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rick! Could you please help?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じ、自分ですか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの子のレベルは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her level is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう相手が軍内でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even within the army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単には見つからぬほど高すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so high that it's not easy to find a partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相手が出来るのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for who can be with her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう今この場ではリック殿くらいしか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right now, Lord Rick is about the only one here who can!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、しかし……自分は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: B-but... I am...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなこと頼むのはぶしつけと知っておる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know it's rude to ask for something like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, at this moment...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こらこらこらー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey hey hey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス殿……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L-Lord Rance...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故俺様に頼まない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why wouldn't you ask me!
